subject: Basketball

Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Listening to hip-hop and growing up playing pickup basketball in Shenzhen, Yi Jianlian stands as a symbol of basketball discovery that is rippling through China.
